stories.text:
Does it ever get discouraging

Imagine you're in your late 20s,30s or early 40s and although you are successfully ny most objective measures in terms of net worth and or income , you will never be super wealthy. You will not be in the league of bozos, musk, google founders and vc, Zuckerberg, and so on. Or even chris sacca , who is knly worth a billion. It's like you're doing it wrong. Why are these other pl sosuccesfull and I am just above average? It,s like why keep trying if true greatness is out of reach.
stories.title: Does it ever get discouraging

stories.text:
The reason for asking is pure curiosity. My impression is that alternative source code management (SCM) tools occupy a tiny fraction of the SCM space. In contrast, GitHub's domination of the SCM space appears almost complete.

If you are using an alternative SCM tool to GitHub what is the tool and why did choose it over GitHub?
stories.title: Ask HN: Are you using a source code management (SCM) tool that is not GitHub?
